subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit: To promote and develop the information and formation of European citizens about the moral and social values of Christianity, to contribute to the formation of the youth and to close ties among young people from different cultures by passing on to them the Christian heritage and the European cultural patrimony.
